blog.name: wittychicken
blog.title: WittyChicken Is Smol & Anxious
blog.description: Aussie 🇦🇺~ Currently Obsessed: My Hero Academia, Spider-Man~ I do Fanfic (they're really bad) but I don't do requests ~ If you have any questions about me or anything else, pls ask me! 😊

tags: i dont know why i dreamed this but todoroki was cute af
Dabi was being a little shit tho
summary: I had a mini dream last night
body:
I had a mini dream last night

I was the healer for the villains and Dabi was injured so I was trying to heal him, But he was being a little bitch about it and grabbed Villain!Todoroki and threatened to slam his face into the counter and break his nose. Todoroki wasn’t fighting back because he was injured too and was really tired so he was just groaning in pain. Just as Dabi went to slam Todoroki’s face into the counter I stood in front of Todoroki so his face would land in my chest instead of the counter. Then me and Todoroki had a kinda romantic stare off where we just looked into each other’s eyes and I was caressing his face.

Suddenly, Dabi was going all like ‘Oh you’d rather heal him then huh? Some healer you are’ and I was just like ‘Dabi no bby come back, your hurt I just wanna heal you’ and Todoroki was clinging to my waist and nuzzling my chest.

It was a fun dream.

title: To Be Kinder
description:
by CookieCats

This boy, this self-proclaimed champion and assumed monster had shown Kirishima the truth of what he was. Underneath all the smoke and pride has was the same as all of them.

He was just a boy.
Just a child.
And Kirishima was in love.

Words: 2108, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: F/F, F/M, M/M, Multi
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Bakugou Katsuki’s Parents, Kirishima Eijirou, Kirishima Eijirou’s Family, Ashido Mina, Uraraka Ochako, Jirou Kyouka, Yaoyorozu Momo, Midoriya Izuku, Todoroki Shouto’s family (mentioned), Yaoyorozu Momo’s Parents (brief but mostly just mentioned), Class 1-A (My Hero Academia), Tetsutetsu Tetsutetsu, more to be added
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Kirishima Eijirou, Ashido Mina/Uraraka Ochako, Jirou Kyouka/Yaoyorozu Momo, Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto
  • Additional Tags: Getting Together, Drunken Confessions, but then not drunken confessions, Internalized Homophobia, yeah its a bit angsty??? sorry this is kinda vent-y but I promise it gets a happy ending, Mutual Pining, Emotional Hurt/Comfort, Emotional/Psychological Abuse, Physical Abuse, HoH!Bakugou, Scars, god these tags are sad, i swear this isnt supposed to be a super angsty fic, just some real heavy topics, also bakugou loves his friends, lot of uwus there, basically this is all just self projection onto anime characters, Healing, Bakugou likes the rain, Basically this is a character study of Bakugou and his truama, just romance flavored, they are in their 3rd year

title: this is fine
description:
by desikaido

Deep breath in. Exhale out. Whoosh. Inhale through the nose for a count of four, hold for seven, exhale out to a count of eight. Whoosh. That’s one breath.

He only needed five.

My Hero Academia Master List

title: Well-Being (T-Rated, One-Shot, Bakugo/Gender-Neutral Reader)
body:
“Good morning, Bakugo-san, is he home?”

Your words hung between the two of you for a moment before they finally sunk in and Mitsuki’s eyebrows rose. Her eyes were shadowed with lack of sleep, though with the return of her son you hoped that she’d return to her lively self soon enough. After a moment of her jaw working, she nodded and stepped to the side.

Seeing Mitsuki so subdued was unsettling, and having the home be so silent once you crossed the threshold made you feel uneasy. You’d been to the Bakugou household plenty of times before. Studying with your friends, movie nights that Katsuki bitched about, the morning after where you woke on the couch in a pair of arms—

“He’s in his room, sweetheart. I’m sure he’ll be glad to see you, since he hasn’t been able to leave.”

With that, Mitsuki left you alone in the doorway to move deeper into the house. After a moment’s hesitation, you started your climb up the stairs to where you knew Katsuki’s room was. It was the only one with a closed door, the door’s trim a bit loose from repeated slamming. Inside, you could hear quiet music, so you knew he must be awake.

Three short knocks came before his voice called for whoever was in the hallway to fuck off. You took that as your cue to open the door and slip inside without a sound. Katsuki was sitting on the windowsill, food tapping against the wall restlessly as he looked outside.

“I said fuck off.”

“Yeah, well, you too, doofus,” You responded without hesitation, used to his abrasive attitude and knowing that being cooped up was starting to grate on any of the patience he may have had left. You dropped to sit on the end of his bed, a few feet away from his slouched position in the window, and didn’t say anything further.

The music was quiet, filling the space comfortably, but you could tell Katsuki was getting irritated with your presence. Right on time, his head snapped to look at you, and he had his usual glare on his face. You finally spoke, “Are you okay?”

“Fuck!”

You flinched as he pushed himself to his feet and stomped away from the window. After pacing a few times, he rounded on you, “That’s all anyone’s been fucking asking me? ‘Are you okay? Are you hurt? How are you?’ Fuck, if I wanted to talk about it I’d tell you!”

“No, you wouldn’t,” You argued, getting to your feet so he no longer towered over you. It was a simple intimidation trick he liked to use, and though you were long passed letting that work on you, you weren’t going to let him try it this time, “We ask because we’re worried, Katsuki. It’s because we care about you—”

“Well I don’t care about you!”

For a moment, those words stung, paired with the raw fury on his face and the smell wafting through the air of caramel that warned his quirk was slipping free. You let out a long sigh and rubbed the bridge of your nose, “I didn’t come here to fight about this, Katsuki. You realize being kidnapped isn’t just about you, right? We all had to worry that something happened to you, that you were dead. We’re not asking if you’re okay for you, we’re asking it for our own peace of mind.”

“What the hell does it even matter? I’m right here and I’m fine, stuck in this shitty house, being messaged at all hours of the fucking day by you idiots that can’t mind your own business—”

“Your well-being is our business—!”

“No, it’s fucking not! Why the hell would it be your business, you stupid—”

“Because I love you, you idiot!” Your voice had risen in volume as you took a step closer. All of the fight in Katsuki left in a single breath as he stared back at you with wide eyes, blindsided by an admission that you hadn’t been intending to make today… Or ever.

But it was too late, so you steeled yourself and reached out to grab his elbow and hold it firmly, grounding yourself and your racing heartbeat, “I’ve loved you this entire time, and rescuing you was the scariest thing I’d ever done, because I had no clue if you were even alive. Do you know what that would have done to me, Katsuki? If we showed up and all that was there was your fucking body!? I can’t stop seeing it every night in my sleep!”

Your grip tightened, then you slipped your hand off his arm to drop back to your side. He still said nothing as you averted your gaze to look at the wall over his shoulder, “So, it is my business, because without you I’d be lost.”

“You’re stupid,” He finally announced, and you looked at him incredulously. His mouth upturned the slightest bit, looking a bit sad, “Someone like me? Seriously? It’s like you’re a glutton for punishment.”

“Yeah, someone like you… Strong, smart, dedicated—”

“Knock it off,” He cut you off and lowered his eyes, that small smile still present, “You could’ve picked a better time to tell me all that, dipshit.”

“Well, I wasn’t really going to say anything at all,” You answered, letting out a humorless laugh, “No point putting words to an unrequited love, right?”

“Who said it was unrequited?” Katsuki’s eyes bore into yours now as he stepped closer, near enough for his natural body heat to sink into your clothes, “I said you were stupid, not wrong.”

summary:
i love shipping charts so here are my opinions :)
jirou and bakubro? best friends? yes.

mina and kendou? i love...
caption: i love shipping charts so here are my opinions :) jirou and bakubro? best friends? yes. mina and kendou? i love them hatsume and aoyama? don’t tell me they WOULDNT love showing things off to each other. TOP brotp. kami calling bakugou “kacchan?” reading the manga pays off BIG TIME romantic todomomo? i? don’t?understand? PLATONIC todomomo? sign. me. up. sero and shouji? they’re together all the time in official art. why? because they are TOTALLY friends.
